name: forage
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to go from place to place searching for things that you can eat or use: forage for The children had been living on the streets, foraging for scraps. The pigs foraged in the woods for acorns. The chef offers special dishes of wild and foraged foods, including wood pigeon and snails.

food grown for horses and farm animals: winter forage forage crops We'll have to maximize home-grown forages so we can cut back on grain.
